original_title: Giant: The World Of Filmmaker Jeff Leroy
overview: On the rooftop of his apartment in Long Beach, CA, we enter the world of one-of-a-kind filmmaker Jeff Leroy where giant women and Kaiju fight it out. Meet his dedicated cast and crew who risk everything for art. A funny, informative documentary that demonstrates how one can make amazing cinema with a tiny budget and a huge imagination.
title: Giant: The World Of Filmmaker Jeff Leroy
